custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT calendarId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Calendar WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] (calendarResourceId = ? OR ? IS NULL) AND ( (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {Calendar.*} FROM Calendar WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] (calendarResourceId = ? OR ? IS NULL) AND ( (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) [$ORDER_BY$]

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT calendarResourceId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CalendarResource WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] (classNameId = ? OR ? IS NULL) AND ( (lower(code_) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (type_ LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (active_ = ?)

SELECT {CalendarResource.*} FROM CalendarResource WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] (classNameId = ? OR ? IS NULL) AND ( (lower(code_) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (type_ LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (active_ = ?) [$ORDER_BY$]
